text_block_list.text:
My, thank you. 
I didn't think you would remember.
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
Come on, I could never forget the 
birthday of my dear friend!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
As proof, I even prepared a present 
for you!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Although, I'm not sure if you'll 
actually want to have it. It may 
not really suit you...
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
You doofus. How could a King possibly 
reject something a dear friend put her 
heart into?
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
No need to be bashful, now. 
I will accept your offering!
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
Thank goodness! 
I didn't make it for nothing, after all!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
My "King does whatever Seiun Sky 
tells her to do" ticket!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
You made a ticket for me? That's such aâ€” 
Wait.
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text: Why do I have to listen to you? Shouldn't it be the other way around?
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
Ahahaha! 
I hoped you wouldn't notice...!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
